summary: Information Technology professional with 10+ years of experience in IT hardware/software deployment, helpdesk support, data migration, Active Directory administration, NAS/Novell and Windows environments, and project coordination for large-scale migrations.

experience.title: Information Technology Support Specialist / Network Specialist / PC Technician / IT Consultant / Customer Engineer
experience.description: Led design, deployment and operation of IT hardware and software; provided helpdesk support; performed data migration using Robocopy, eDirectory/NDS, and NAS; managed NAS space and server migrations across SunTrust EIS; conducted Remote Desktop operations; supported Active Directory rights for multiple groups; coordinated pre- and post-migration activities and maintained project calendars; updated SharePoint with incidents and resolutions; handled about 50+ end-user calls per week at Command Center.

experience.title: Customer Engineer
experience.description: Prepared directory structures and permissions for NAS users; sent notifications to branch and non-branch managers; used Carbon Copy to migrate PST files; employed Robocopy to move user data to NAS; connected to servers via Remote Desktop to configure tasks; performed cutovers, verified user folders and permissions on NAS; updated Active Directory for H: drive changes; coordinated branch migrations and daily progress reporting.

experience.title: Technical Desktop Support
experience.description: Provided technical desktop support for AT&T upgrade project across 7+ wireless stores; installed Ingenico SigCap devices; updated peripherals; triaged and resolved Remedy tickets; imaged and configured computers for rollout; inventoried equipment; imaged managersâ€™ laptops; delivered store-level IT support.

experience.title: IT Support / Network Support
experience.description: Supported network operations for recruiting team at Radisson Hotel; led deployment of 300 PCs and peripherals; documented inventory for IT Manager; handled shipping and receiving and server installations necessary for forest project.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Information Technology
Associate of Arts: Paralegal Network Engineering
